features: Extracts of viola tricolor, goat's milk and almond milk care for skin sensitized by the stresses of shaving

The Weleda shaving range is free of synthetic fragrances, colors, preservatives and raw materials derived from mineral oils

productInformation.name: Best Sellers Rank
productInformation.value: #56,834 in Beauty & Personal Care (See Top 100 in Beauty & Personal Care) #105 in Men's Shaving Creams

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 7, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars My new favorite shave cream
reviews.reviewText: This has rapidly become my new favorite shaving cream. It is slick when shaving, its mild scent is plant-based and not perfumey in any way. It's a little odd that it comes in an old-fashioned metal tube, but maybe that's more environmentally friendly than plastic?

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 2, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Major product change for the better - thanks Weleda!
reviews.reviewText: I have used this shaving cream for years because it doesn’t irritate or dry out my skin. However it had a big drawback, it was very viscous, thick. I had to be careful putting it on the shaving brush because it was kind of hard and could fall off. It also became difficult to get out of the tube as you got to the end. The new formula has resolved both those issues, and the product quality remains stellar. The cream comes out of the tube easily and foams up better, much easier to work with. Weleda nailed it.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 4, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars Does not lather well with a brush
reviews.reviewText: I have not been able to get a really decent lather with this product after about 100 shaves. I've tried with and without preshave oil, lots of water, soap and water, but it still is thickly blobulous and does not really form a rich lather. I liked the small size because it is TSA allowable, but I don't feel this cream is giving me much help on my shave.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 15, 2016
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Expensive, but a little goes a long way
reviews.reviewText: I love Weleda products. Simple ingredients, and they always function well, smell wonderful, have unique qualities. The shaving cream is lighter than other 'natural' shaving creams I have tried. Just a tiny pea sized blob is enough to make plenty of lather to shave my neck and chin which I do daily. Note that it comes in a tube with a screw cap, just like toothpaste and not under pressure. It would be convenient if the cap had a flip back top to it, since fiddling with a small screw cap with hot wet hands in the early morning can be a challenge.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 4, 2023
reviews.reviewText: Nice cream. Gives one a good shave.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on March 3, 2018
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Worth the cost
reviews.reviewText: I love this shave cream. Waleda is a great company. Their products are 100% natural and the ingredients are very high quality. This has a nice smell, makes a thick lather and keeps the skin moisturized. I use a DE safety razor, and it glides very nicely with this cream. There are less expensive creams out there, but I'm willing to pay more for this stuff.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on March 2, 2012
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Been Using for Years
reviews.reviewText: This is by far the cleanest shaving cream on the market no garbage fillers, expectorants, fragrances, preservatives etc. I have sensitive skin and this has never given me any irritation. It lathers up great - not thick like the can foam stuff, but good enough to provide a slick surface. Has a soft, clean smell.I used to get razor bumps all the time from shaving with a mach III and Gillette - a few years ago I switched to Weleda and a Merkur safety straight razor with Japanese feather blades and never looked back!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 5, 2015
reviews.reviewText: Am I using the same stuff as everyone else?? I can only assume that what I received was counterfeit or had been sitting on the shelf for years and had separated out. The cream is super thick and has a strong tea tree like aroma. Not a bad start. After reading some reviews here I was looking forward to a nice lather after putting about a 3/4" strip in my bowl. I wet my boar bristle brush with hot water, shook out the excess, and started working the cream. It basically dissolved into the brush and produced no lather, not even a little. I thought maybe it needed more water so I added a few drops at a time looking for a sweet spot. Absolutely nothing at all. Next, I decided to follow the label and just rub it into my wet skin with my fingers. Again, the nice thick cream turned into nothing. From what I can tell this stuff is behaving like what a lotion would if you add a few drops of water, it just thins out, and produced 0 lather. I also think it's because it has too much oils in it. After doing the bit with adding a few drops of water I eventually had a skim of water in the bottom of the bowl, and could see oil on the water, but no lather! I can't remember a time when I've been this hopeful about a product (because I love the other Weleda mens shaving products) and been so let down. I feel like it's 1999 again and I just got done watching Star Wars Ep: 1. I guess I am going to request a replacement or something on the assumption that this tube was messed up somehow, and will update my review if it is better.

Beste Rasiercreme.Schäumt gut-lässt sich wunderbar mit einem nassen Rasierpinsel aufschäumen.Riecht gut-duftet einfach frisch markant und nicht nach diesem typischen Rasierschaum-DuftGleitet gut-lässt sich gut verteilen und lässt die Klinge wunderbar gleiten.Zudem sehr ergiebig!Seit ich Weleda Rasiersachen nutze, habe ich keine Hautirritationen mehr.Kann die Creme uneingeschränkt weiterempfehlen.

reviews.reviewTitle: très bonne crème à raser avec blaireau
reviews.reviewText: Crème à raser idéale pour peau relativement sensible et utilisation possible avec blaireau.
Usato con il rasoio Venus da 5 lame. Rende la pelle morbida e la rasatura estremamente fluida e precisa. Sicuramente lo ricomprero
